* Zyber simply kept her optics on DeathScythe.*

" Pureness of spark counts for everything, and does more then you know. If I 
was mean and bitter I WOULD have killed you where you layed, but I did not. 
I took you in and repaied you...only to be threatened with death. But I have 
pure of spark, and I am not weak. I simply chose not to battle."

* Zyber almost didn't see it as DeathScyth fired at her again, sending her 
over towards the opening and slamming against a sharp corner.
She didn't cry out in pain when the rock dug into her back, but she didn't 
rise again, she couldn't.
She hung her head a bit.*

" But you have no...right to speak. You are weak too...or you would not 
have...been laying there in the forst in stasis lock!"
